name: Candle Catastrophe!
description:
Candle Catastrophe! Story:

Its your son's 5th birthday and you are getting his birthday cake when you realize that you don't have any candles at home! so you have to go to the store and purchase them, but there aren't any employees around? weird.

Gameplay:

You use W A S D to move your bean around, touch the red candles to collect them

Differences Between the versions:

The 1 Hour version is the version I made in only 1 hour. The Better version took me 3 hours to make and includes a couple of comfort features like a speedrun clock, actual textures and a 5th candle
